pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Step Adaptive Estimation Methods for Sparse Regressions // Multi-step adaptive elastic-net (MSAENet) algorithm for feature selection in high-dimensional regressions proposed in Xiao and Xu (2015) DOI:10.1080/00949655.2015.1016944, with support for multi-step adaptive MCP-net (MSAMNet) and multi-step adaptive SCAD-net (MSASNet) methods.
